oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: All Star Western Theatre - 1948-02-07 - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 1 of All Star Western Theatre radio program from February 7, 1948. Featuring Foy Willing and the Riders Of The Purple Sage, with announcer Terry O'Sullivan.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Foy Willing; Riders Of The Purple Sage
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Theme (Drifting Along, Singing A Song) -- Opening statement (Terry O'Sullivan) -- Cimarron (Roll On) (Foy Willing and the Riders Of The Purple Sage) -- Foy Willing talks -- Missouri Waltz (Foy Willing and the Riders Of The Purple Sage) -- Weber's Bread commercial -- Terry O'Sullivan introduces the Riders Of The Purple Sage -- Ragtime Cowboy Joe (Foy Willing and the Riders Of The Purple Sage) -- Terry O'Sullivan introduces the Riders Of The Purple Sage -- Ages And Ages Ago (Foy Willing and the Riders Of The Purple Sage) -- Terry O'Sullivan introduces the radio play -- Radio play 'The Gold Spurs' [continued in part 2]
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: KNX (Radio station : Los Angeles, Calif.); All star western theatre (Radio program); O'Sullivan, Terry, 1915-2006; Willing, Foy, 1914-1978; Riders of the Purple Sage; Sloey, Al; Paul, Johnny (Violinist); Harrell, Scotty; Preston, Lou; Farnworth, Scott; Wilson, Ray (Writer); Logan, Janet, 1919-1965; Conrad, Paul (Actor)
